definitions.text: the result of a mathematical integration; F(x) is the integral of f(x) if dF/dx = f(x)
existing as an essential constituent or characteristic
examples: the Ptolemaic system with its built-in concept of periodicity
a constitutional inability to tell the truth

definitions.text: constituting the undiminished entirety; lacking nothing essential especially not damaged; - Bacon
examples: a local motion keepeth bodies integral
was able to keep the collection entire during his lifetime
fought to keep the union intact

definitions.text: of or denoted by an integer
